*10.09.2011*
 * Compare multiple IFC files
    ** This feature allows the user to compare multiple files at the level of number of IFC objects for each IFC class. 
      Demo :[http://demo.ifcwebserver.org/doc/ifcwebserver_simple_compare.png screenshot]
   ** How it works ?
  Select the files which u like to compare from the files list (click ctrl or shift to select them) then press "Go" button

{{{
    URL syntax:
    http://server/ifcwebserver/ifc.rb?ifc_file=file1.ifc|file2.ifc|...|fileN.ifc&q=objects_list
}}}

 * Add wiki page : [http://code.google.com/p/ifcwebserver/wiki/extensions How to extend/modfiy IfcWebServer to meet your needs]

*28.08.2011*
 * Add model tree views (hierarchical structure of the objects)
  ** Containment view
{{{
URL syntax: http://server/ifcwebserver/ifc.rb?ifc_file=xxx.ifc&q=model_tree
}}}
  ** Containment view (IfcRelAggregates only) 
{{{
URL syntax: http://server/ifcwebserver/ifc.rb?ifc_file=xxx.ifc&q=model_tree_IfcRelAggregates
}}}
  ** Containment view (IfcRelContainedInSpatialStructure only) 
{{{
URL syntax: 
http://server/ifcwebserver/ifc.rb?ifc_file=xxx.ifc&q=model_tree_IfcRelContainedInSpatialStructure
}}}
